# spellOut

**Type Property**

Values are spelled out and fields are displayed in their full name. For example, “two hours, ten minutes”, “2小時10分鐘”

## Declaration

```swift
static var spellOut: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style { get }
```
title: spellOut
